sentences.simplifiedText: 学生们纷纷离开了教室。
sentences.traditionalText: 學生們紛紛離開了教室。
sentences.pinyin: Xuéshēng men fēnfēn líkāi le jiàoshì.
sentences.translation: The students left the classroom one after another.

sentences.simplifiedText: 听到放学的铃声，学生们纷纷收拾书包，离开了教室。
sentences.traditionalText: 聽到放學的鈴聲，學生們紛紛收拾書包，離開了教室。
sentences.pinyin: Tīng dào fàngxué de língshēng, xuéshēng men fēnfēn shōushí shūbāo, líkāi le jiàoshì.
sentences.translation: When they heard the school bell, the students packed their bags one after another and left the classroom.
Walk out of the classroom one by one

sentences.simplifiedText: 学生们完成考试后，纷纷离开教室
sentences.traditionalText: 學生們完成考試後，紛紛離開教室
sentences.pinyin: Xuéshēngmen wánchéng kǎoshì hòu, fēnfēn líkāi jiàoshì
sentences.translation: After finishing the exam, the students left the classroom one by one

sentences.pinyin: tā men fēn fēn diǎn tóu zàn tóng.
sentences.translation: They nodded their heads in agreement one after another.

sentences.simplifiedText: 听到好消息，他们纷纷挤过来表示祝贺。
sentences.traditionalText: 聽到好消息，他們紛紛擠過來表示祝賀。
sentences.pinyin: tīng dào hǎo xiāo xi, tā men fēn fēn jǐ guò lái biǎo shì zhù hè.
sentences.translation: Hearing the good news, they all crowded over to express their congratulations.
The students asked questions one after another.

sentences.simplifiedText: 听到这个消息，网友们纷纷表示惊讶。
sentences.traditionalText: 聽到這個消息，網友們紛紛表示驚訝。
sentences.pinyin: tīng dào zhège xiāoxi, wǎngyǒumen fēnfēn biǎoshì jīngyà.
sentences.translation: Upon hearing this news, netizens expressed surprise one after another.
